ST10-001.name: Trafalgar Law ST10-001
ST10-001.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −3 Place up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 3000 power or less at the bottom of the owner's deck, and play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your hand.

ST10-002.name: Monkey D. Luffy ST10-002
ST10-002.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] If you have 0 DON!! cards on your field or 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

ST10-003.name: Eustass 'Captain' Kid ST10-003
ST10-003.effect: [Your Turn] If you have 4 or more Life cards, give this Leader −1000 power. [When Attacking] DON!! −1 This Leader gains +2000 power during this turn.

ST10-004.name: Sanji ST10-004
ST10-004.effect: [On Play] If your opponent has a Character with 5000 or more power, this Character gains [Rush] during this turn.

ST10-005.name: Jinbe ST10-005
ST10-005.effect: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn.

ST10-006.name: Monkey D. Luffy ST10-006
ST10-006.effect: [Rush] [Once Per Turn] When your opponent activates a [Blocker], K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 8000 power or less.

ST10-007.name: Killer ST10-007
ST10-007.effect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When a DON!! card on your field is returned to your DON!! deck, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

ST10-008.name: Shachi & Penguin ST10-008
ST10-008.effect: [On Play] If you have 3 or less DON!! cards on your field, add up to 2 DON!! cards from your DON!! deck and rest them.

ST10-009.name: Jean Bart ST10-009
ST10-009.effect: [On Play] ➀ Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

ST10-010.name: Trafalgar Law ST10-010
ST10-010.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] DON!! −1 If your opponent has 7 or more cards in their hand, trash 2 cards from your opponent's hand.

ST10-011.name: Heat ST10-011
ST10-011.effect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When a DON!! card on your field is returned to your DON!! deck, this Character gains +2000 power until the start of your next turn.

ST10-012.name: Bepo ST10-012
ST10-012.effect: [On Play]/[When Attacking] If your opponent has more DON!! cards on their field than you, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

ST10-013.name: Eustass 'Captain' Kid ST10-013
ST10-013.effect: [On Play]/[When Attacking] DON!! −1 Up to 1 of your Leader gains +1000 power until the start of your next turn.

ST10-014.name: Wire ST10-014
ST10-014.effect: [Blocker] [Once Per Turn] When a DON!! card on your field is returned to your DON!! deck, draw 1 card and trash 1 card from your hand.

ST10-015.name: Gum-Gum Giant Sumo Slap ST10-015
ST10-015.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle, and K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 2000 power or less.

ST10-016.name: Gum-Gum Kong Gatling ST10-016
ST10-016.effect: [Main] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 7000 power or less. [Trigger] Up to 1 of your Leader gains +1000 power until the end of your next turn.

ST10-017.name: Punk Vise ST10-017
ST10-017.effect: [Main] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less, and add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it. [Trigger] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
